headline.main: ARK ROYAL'S CREW IS CALM IN SINKING; Writer Aboard Describes Scene in Which Marine Joked at Ease of Destroyer Rescue MEN SAD OVER SHIP LOSS ' Damned Hard Luck on the Old Lady,' Says Sailor as He Goes to Deck to Take Leave

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Saturday, Nov. 15 (U.P.) -- The crew of the aircraft carrier Ark Royal behaved as calmly with their great warship sinking under their feet as if she had been safely tied at a dock, survivors of the torpedoing said today.
abstract: U S Navy repts 2 more Brit warships in U S ports

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
